Smart Toothbrush with Sensors: A toothbrush equipped with sensors that monitor the pressure and frequency of brushing, providing personalized feedback to the user on their brushing technique and habits.

Toothbrush with Built-in Toothpaste Dispenser: A toothbrush with a built-in toothpaste dispenser that dispenses just the right amount of toothpaste onto the bristles for each use, reducing waste and ensuring optimal brushing experience.

Toothbrush with UV Sterilization: A toothbrush with a built-in UV sterilization feature that kills 99.9% of germs and bacteria on the bristles after each use, providing an extra layer of protection against oral health issues.

Toothbrush with Augmented Reality: A toothbrush with an augmented reality feature that provides real-time visual feedback to the user on their brushing technique, including proper angle, pressure, and duration.

Toothbrush with Voice Control: A toothbrush that can be controlled with voice commands, allowing the user to set a timer, switch between modes, and adjust the pressure and frequency of brushing without having to physically interact with the toothbrush.
